name: Skater Girl: Endless Surfer
description:
Play with keyboard (arrow keys and mouse or enter) or play with XboxOne controller. Haven't tested with Playstation controller but  give it a try,

Speed increases  as you collect more orbs. Also pick up the green shield icon to safely pass through objects for a limited amount of time.  Also pick up the pink clocks as they will slow down time for a limited amount of time. This game is fun and addictive and I loved playing it and making it.
